Welcome to the University Timetable Management System.

 1. Data Usage and Privacy
 - Your registration information will be stored securely in our database.
 - Personal information will only be used for account management and system functionality.
 - Uploaded documents (e.g., ID and university contract) will be stored securely and are only accessible to system administrators.


2. Account Approval
 - All registrations are subject to review and approval by administrators.
 - Account approval may take up to 24-48 hours.
 - You will not be able to access the system until your account is approved.


3. System Usage
 - The application system is for educational purposes only.
 - You agree to use the system in accordance with university policies.
 - Any misuse of the system may result in account suspension.


4. Responsibilities
 - You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.
 - You agree to notify administrators of any unauthorized use of your account.
 - You are responsible for keeping your contact information up-to-date.


By accepting these terms, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the conditions for using the University Timetable Management System.
